name: @lskjs/mailer
description: LSK module for send and receive emails.
author: Igor Suvorov <hi@isuvorov.com>

scripts.release: npm run babel-build && npm publish --access=public dist
scripts.babel-build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp {package.json,package-lock.json,README.md} dist/ && npx babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps inline --copy-files
